Package uno.anahata.asi.context

Class ContextManager

java.lang.Object
uno.anahata.asi.context.ContextManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
PropertyChangeSource
public class ContextManager extends Object implements PropertyChangeSource
The definitive manager for a chat session's context in the V2 architecture. This class owns the conversation history and orchestrates the hybrid context assembly process, combining the V2 dynamic history with the V1 provider model.
Author:
anahata-ai

  • Constructor Details

    • ContextManager

      public ContextManager(@NonNull @NonNull Chat chat)
      Constructs a new ContextManager.
      Parameters:
      chat - The parent chat session.

  • Method Details

    • init

      public void init()
      Initializes the manager and registers default providers.

    • clear

      public void clear()
      Clears the entire conversation history and resets all internal counters to zero. Fires a property change event for the "history" property.

    • registerContextProvider

      public void registerContextProvider(ContextProvider provider)
      Registers a new context provider.
      Parameters:
      provider - The provider to register.

    • getSystemInstructions

      public List<String> getSystemInstructions()
      Gets the list of system instructions by processing all enabled providers and all managed resources at the SYSTEM_INSTRUCTIONS position.
      Returns:
      A list of TextParts for system instructions.

    • buildVisibleHistory

      public List<AbstractMessage> buildVisibleHistory()
      Builds the final, filtered list of messages to be sent to the API. This includes the main conversation history and any just-in-time context from PROMPT_AUGMENTATION providers and resources.
      Returns:
      The filtered list of messages.

    • addMessage

      public void addMessage(AbstractMessage message)
      The definitive method for adding any message to the chat history. It injects the chat reference, assigns sequential IDs to all parts, and triggers the hard-pruning process.
      Parameters:
      message - The message to add.

    • ensureToolMessageFolllowsModelMessage

      public void ensureToolMessageFolllowsModelMessage(AbstractModelMessage modelMessage)
      Checks it the model message has an associated tool message and adds it to the history.
      Parameters:
      modelMessage - - the model message
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the model message doesnt have an associated tool message.

    • removeMessage

      public void removeMessage(AbstractMessage message)
      Removes a message from the history. Fires a property change event for the "history" property.
      Parameters:
      message - The message to remove.

    • getHistory

      public List<AbstractMessage> getHistory()
      Gets the complete, canonical conversation history for this session.
      Returns:
      A synchronized, unmodifiable list of all messages.

    • getTotalTokenCount

      public int getTotalTokenCount()
      Gets the current total token count of all parts in the context.
      Returns:
      The total token count.

    • getTokenThreshold

      public int getTokenThreshold()
      Gets the maximum number of tokens allowed in the context window.
      Returns:
      The token threshold.

    • addPropertyChangeListener

      public void addPropertyChangeListener(PropertyChangeListener listener)
      Adds a PropertyChangeListener to this manager.
      Parameters:
      listener - The listener to add.

    • removePropertyChangeListener

      public void removePropertyChangeListener(PropertyChangeListener listener)
      Removes a PropertyChangeListener from this manager.
      Parameters:
      listener - The listener to remove.

    • getPropertyChangeSupport

      public PropertyChangeSupport getPropertyChangeSupport()
      Gets the PropertyChangeSupport instance for this object.
      Specified by:

      Returns:
      The PropertyChangeSupport.
